com.google.gwt.uibinder.client.impl
Class AbstractUiRenderer

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.uibinder.client.impl.AbstractUiRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
UiRenderer
public abstract class AbstractUiRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements UiRenderer

Abstract implementation of a safe HTML binder to make implementation of generated rendering simpler.

Nested Class Summary
protected static class AbstractUiRenderer.UiRendererDispatcher<T>

Method Detail

buildInnerId

protected static java.lang.String buildInnerId(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                               java.lang.String uiId)
Build id strings used to identify DOM elements related to ui:fields.

Parameters:
fieldName - name of the field that identifies the element
uiId - common part of the identifier for all elements in the rendered DOM structure

findInnerField

protected static Element findInnerField(Element parent,
                                        java.lang.String fieldName,
                                        java.lang.String attribute)
Retrieves a specific element within a previously rendered element.

Parameters:
parent - parent element containing the element of interest
fieldName - name of the field to retrieve
attribute - that identifies the root element as such
Returns:
the element identified by fieldName
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parent does not point to or contains a previously rendered element. In DevMode also when the root element is not attached to the DOM
java.lang.IllegalStateException - parent does not contain an element matching filedName
java.lang.RuntimeException - if the root element is not attached to the DOM and not running in DevMode
java.lang.NullPointerException - if parent == null

findRootElement

protected static Element findRootElement(Element parent,
                                         java.lang.String attribute)
Retrieves the root of a previously rendered element contained within the parent. The parent must either contain the previously rendered DOM structure as its only child, or point directly to the rendered element root.

Parameters:
parent - element containing, or pointing to, a previously rendered DOM structure
attribute - attribute name that identifies the root of the DOM structure
Returns:
the root element of the previously rendered DOM structure
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if parent == null
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parent does not contain a previously rendered element

stampUiRendererAttribute

protected static SafeHtml stampUiRendererAttribute(SafeHtml safeHtml,
                                                   java.lang.String attributeName,
                                                   java.lang.String attributeValue)
Inserts an attribute into the first tag found in a safeHtml template. This method assumes that the safeHtml template begins with an open HTML tag. SafeHtml templates produced by UiBinder always meet these conditions.

This method does not attempt to ensure atributeName and attributeValue contain safe values.

isParentOrRenderer

public boolean isParentOrRenderer(Element parent)
Description copied from interface: UiRenderer
Checks whether parent is a valid element to use as an argument for field getters.

Specified by:
isParentOrRenderer in interface UiRenderer
Returns:
true if parent contains or directly points to a previously rendered element. In DevMode it also checks whether the parent is attached to the DOM
